lore: §7Siamese Lynxes, also known as Bagheera and Azrael,
§7in-game are the second most common mobs found in
§7depending on the rarity of your Griffin Pet. You
§7have to hit the lynxes one at a time, the correct
§7one being indicated by angry villager particles.
